text: Alberobello is a city in southern Italy. Alberobello is in the Apulia Region and has 10,735 people. It is famous for its trullo buildings. The trulli of Alberobello became a UNESCO World Heritage since 1996. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Alberobello.com * Alberobello Tourism Category:Cities in the Metropolitan City of Bari Category:World Heritage Sites in Italy
title: Alberobello
